dcterms:creator: Gurulingappa
dcterms:description: The ADE dataset includes two entity types: Drug and Adverse-Effect, and a single relation type: Adverse-Effect. It contains 4272 sentences and 6821 relations in total, with some relations removed due to overlapping entities.
dcterms:title: ADE

dcterms:creator: D. Roth
W. Yih
dcterms:description: The CoNLL04 dataset contains four entity types: Location, Organization, Person, and Other, and five relation types: Kill, Live_in, Located_in, OrgBased_in, Work_for. It is divided into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: CoNLL04
